questions.text: Which of the following is true with respect to Network Virtualization?
options: It abstracts the virtual network on a physical network
It abstracts the physical network on a virtual network
It is essentially a collection of physical SDN routers
Network virtualization is a non-existent concept.
questions.correctAnswer: It abstracts the physical network on a virtual network

questions.text: For rule placement at the edge with respect to Software Defined IoT, which of the following is a critical issue that is required to be addressed?
options: Mobility of end users and nodes
questions.correctAnswer: Mobility of end users and nodes

questions.text: Which cloud service model allows users to deploy and control their own software, including operating systems, while the provider manages the infrastructure?
Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS)?
options: Requires users to manage the virtual machines
Simplifies development by abstracting the infrastructure
questions.correctAnswer: Requires users to manage the virtual machines

What is the primary function of a Light Virtual Access Point (LVAP) in the ODIN architecture for SDN-based IoT?
options: Acts as a firewall between user devices and access points
Enables virtualization of Wi-Fi APs for per-client network control
